entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
